metadata.title: CVE-2019-14202 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Das U-Boot through 2019.07. There is astack-based buffer overflow in this nfs_handler reply helper function:nfs_readlink_reply.

criterions.comment: u-boot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
